caption.title: Radar plot showing projected change in aggressiveness (mean lesion size) of three Pectobacterium and Dickeya species relative to P. atrosepticum under three CO 2 emissions scenarios.
caption.p: (A) low CO 2 emissions 2040s, (B) medium CO 2 emissions 2060s, and (C) high CO 2 emissions 2080s. Data are normalized by the maximum projected P. atrosepticum lesion size. Pba = P. atrosepticum, Pbr = P. carotovorum subsp. brasiliense, Ppa = P. parmentieri, and Dsol = D. solani.
